Package ru.nsu.fit.makhov.snake.model.snakes

Class AbstractSnake

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.makhov.snake.model.snakes.AbstractSnake
Direct Known Subclasses:
HamiltonSnake, PlayerSnake, SimpleSnake
public abstract class AbstractSnake extends Object
Main logic of all snakes. Other snakes must extend this class.
